# NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo

**Protocol**

A protocol that defines the interface for section objects vended by a fetched results controller.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo
```

## Accessing Objects

- **numberOfObjects**: The number of objects (rows) in the section.
- **objects**: The array of objects in the section.

## Accessing the Name and Title

- **name**: The name of the section.
- **indexTitle**: The index title of the section.

## Responding to Changes

- **NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate**: A delegate protocol that describes the methods that the associated fetched results controller calls when the fetch results change.
- **NSFetchRequestResultType**: Constants that specify the possible result types a fetch request can return.
- **NSFetchedResultsChangeType**: Constants that specify the possible types of changes that are reported.
